result.content:
Zuerst legen wir einen User im eDir an.

script Ldap Operation Script metatree
create object cn=jpublic,ou=MI,ou=VM,ou=V,o=STW with class inetOrgPerson and attributes
sn "Public"
givenName "Joe"
ensure object exists; cn=jpublic,ou=MI,ou=VM,ou=V,o=STW
delete object; cn=jpublic,ou=MI,ou=VM,ou=V,o=STW

Dieser darf noch nicht ins AD transferiert werden

script Ldap Operation Script ad
ensure not Method ensureNotCnJpublicOuMIOuVMOuVOuSTWDc2k12DcTsc[1] not found in idmfit.LdapOperationScript. object exists; cn=jpublic,ou=MI,ou=VM,ou=V,ou=STW,dc=2k12,dc=tsc

Erst wenn im eDir der User zur Gruppe ADSYNC hinzukommt,

script Ldap Operation Script metatree
add attributes and values; cn=jpublic,ou=MI,ou=VM,ou=V,o=STW
groupmembership "cn=ADSYNC
ou=GRP o=STW"
securityEquals "cn=ADSYNC
ou=GRP o=STW"

wird er auch im AD angelegt

script Ldap Operation Script ad
ensure object exists; cn=jpublic,ou=MI,ou=VM,ou=V,ou=STW,dc=2k12,dc=tsc

instructionResult.instruction:
{id='scriptTable_0_1', instruction='call', instanceName='scriptTableActor', methodName='createObjectWithClassAndAttributes', args=[cn=jpublic,ou=MI,ou=VM,ou=V,o=STW, inetOrgPerson,
sn "Public"
givenName "Joe"
]}

{id='scriptTable_2_1', instruction='call', instanceName='scriptTableActor', methodName='addAttributesAndValues', args=[cn=jpublic,ou=MI,ou=VM,ou=V,o=STW,
groupmembership "cn=ADSYNC
ou=GRP o=STW"
securityEquals "cn=ADSYNC
ou=GRP o=STW"
]}
